pinyin: bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: And you don't have to apply historical dialectic materialism to daily life.
sentences.chinese: 而且你不必把歷史辯證唯物主義應用於日常生活。

sentences.english: That's why he called his system dialectical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼他稱他的體系爲辯證唯物主義。
